name: Pedro the Lost Levels 2
description:
In a foreign land, Pedro is tasked with escorting a caravan of Hoodlins to Olive Mountain for their annual festival, but he will be opposed by demons that stalk the lands.

controls:

A - left

D - right

S - down

W - up/interact with doors, people, etc

L - jump

K - shoot

Enter - select on title screen/stop reading dialogue

Want more run & gun action like this? Buy the game that takes place before it! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2013800/Pedro_Land_DX/
